website_summaries.verdict: Powerful hair regrowth tonic designed for men but can be used for women, too.
pros: Salon quality product that historically has only been offered in salons
Instantly thickens current hair while it works to regrow new hair
2-ounce formula comes with precise dropper so you won't waste any of the product
cons: Customers with a sensitive scalp complained about a burning sensation

customer_reviews.title: You will lose hair at first, but it comes back better than before
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got my hair back thanks to this. In my experience. The first 2 months were terrible. I lost so much hair but kept using it. About 3 months in, I started to like not wearing a hat anymore. Forgot I was using this and forgot about my hair line falling back and my bald spot on the back of my head at age 23. Yesterday I noticed how much thicker my hair is and the new hair on the back of my head were I once was bald. My hairline is back to what it was in high school. You will lose hair in the beginning but keep going. I’m glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using 2nd bottle now for almost two months. I haven't seen any good result yet. I just ordered 3rd bottle and will be patient to try one more. Will update the rating if it turns out to be good. Update: I am using 3rd bottles. I haven't seen any result yet but my scalp develops itching and irritation so I stopped using it. I was using many hair products. They did not work for me but none gave me this problem. Reduced from 3 stars to 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tran

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works.. it really does. Try twice daily without fail for a month and you will see the difference. Caution.. dont ruin it by using over the counter shampoo... Get a shampoo thats meant for mens hair regrowth. Now, i am on my second month and delighted with the results. Even receding hairline is now showing good results.

I did not see that it was for MEN ONLY until I had this in my hot little hands and then when I tried to return it, Amazon promptly let me know 'NO CAN DO". customer_reviews.title: Great product. Been using it off and on for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Been using it off and on for several years after I started to lose hair at an exponential rate. At my last haircut I noticed that it was visibly VERY thin. Used this once per day for two months and can see a significant change in the thickness of the hair on my head. I think once you get the hair returning you don't need to continue to do the twice daily treatment. I use it less often as a maintenance dose and it works fine but I do understand that individual results may vary.

It led me to believe I could use on the entire scalp, but you can't.

customer_reviews.title: Minoxidil is Rogain. It works but be careful.
customer_reviews.text: This will surely make your hair grow back. However minoxidil is the same active ingredient used in Rogain. Once you stop using this you will lose more hair than before. Minoxidil stimulates your hair follicles or (puts them in overdrive) once discontinued a lot of times they will stop producing hair as well.

product_meta.title: Nioxin Minoxidil Hair Regrowth Treatment Men, 2oz
product_meta.description:
NIOXIN Minoxidil Hair Regrowth Treatment 2oz is the only technology proven to effectively help hair regrowth. A colorless liquid medication proven to help regrow hair, designed to be used only on the top of the scalp. Designed to regrow hair with 5% Minoxidil in three-month quantities. This hair regrowth treatment for men helps advanced thinning hair, including receding hairlines and thinning on the crown. When first beginning the NIOXIN Hair Regrowth Treatment, hair loss may continue for up to two weeks. This hair loss is temporary, but if it continues for more than two weeks, clients should consult their doctor. If regrowth is not visible within four months, clients should stop using the treatment and be referred to a medical professional. 

 * NIOXIN Hair REGROWTH Treatment for Men is designed to regrow hair with 5% Minoxidil in one- and three-month quantities
 * NIOXIN Advanced Thinning is a comprehensive range of treatment and care products, designed specifically for advanced thinning hair
 * Helps advanced thinning hair, including receding hairlines and thinning on the crown
 * NOT FOR USE BY WOMEN
 * Award: Behind the Chair Stylist Choice Winner Favorite Thinning Haircare, 16 consecutive years
 * Enroll in Subscribe and Save to ensure you never run out!



ABOUT NIOXIN
NIOXIN is the only salon brand with 25+ years of experience in THINNING HAIR. NIOXIN, supported by The Institute of Trichologists, believes SCALP HEALTH is an extension of facial skin and requires the same attention and care.
